pr_title: [Service Bus] Remove send via option from sender builder

timeline.message: [Service Bus] Remove send via option from sender builder

timeline.bodyText: Should we remove them instead of comment out?
timeline.author: YijunXieMS

replies.bodyText: I kept them so that we can use them in the next update when we add the transaction feature for cross entities back in
replies.author: ramya-rao-a

replies.bodyText:
I can delete the entire file if we feel otherwise.
@conniey, @hemanttanwar ?
replies.author: ramya-rao-a

replies.bodyText:
Normally we delete the test if we do not need it soon. We can always get it back from git history and old commits.
If we are going to introduce this next months or soon, we can disable by adding @Disable annotation.
@Disabled("Reason why disable.")
There are other test in this file, so we can not delete the file but remove the test.
replies.author: hemanttanwar
